  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CCDialogCreator, LabelManager, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class CCMain
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements LabelManager, CCDialogCreator
    The main window of the engine control center.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.07.
    See Also:

        Construct a detailed dialog.

        Type Parameters:
        K - the identifier type of the record
        T - the expected record type
        V - the dialog type
        Parameters:

        selected - the selected item or null to indicate a new item should be created
        detailPanel - the panel containing the detail fields
        namer - the function to convert an entry into string
        retriever - the function to retrieve a record through its id
        saver - the function to save a record and report back an error
        Returns:
        the dialog created
